lead_paragraph: Angelique Kerber showed more passion in the media center than on the court when she crashed out of last year's WTA Finals, the German angered by the format and frustrated by her inability to win the set off an eliminated opponent she needed to advance.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Seeks Reversal of Fortunes in Singapore
headline.main: Kerber Seeks Reversal of Fortunes in Singapore
